HEADLINE: Earnings Call of Kellton Tech Solutions Limited on Tuesday, November 10, 2020
Earnings Call of Kellton Tech Solutions Limited on September 11, 2020
Intimation of Schedule of Earnings Conference call for Q4, FY 2019-20.

This is to inform you that Kellton Tech Solutions Limited will hold its 'Earnings Call' on Monday, June 14, 2021, from 04.00 PM IST.

Mr. Niranjan Chintam- Chairman & Whole-time Director, Mr. Karanjit Singh- Chief Executive Officer, India and Srinivas Potluri -Chief Executive Officer, US shall participate from Kellton Tech Solutions Limited to address the investors and analysts through this call.
